name: canshare-who-thoracic-neuroendocrine-grade
title: NZ WHO thoracic neuroendocrine tumour grade
description: The grade of a cancer, assessed using the WHO Classification of Tumours atypical or typical neuroendocrine tumour grading system for thoracic tumours.

filter.value: 1155712009 |GX: Neuroendocrine tumour grade cannot be assessed| OR 476251000210106 |G1 (typical): Well differentiated neuroendocrine tumour| OR 476241000210108 |G2 (atypical): Well differentiated neuroendocrine tumour|

contains.display: G1: Well differentiated neuroendocrine neoplasm, typical carcinoid of thorax
G2: Well differentiated neuroendocrine neoplasm, atypical carcinoid of thorax
GX: Neuroendocrine neoplasm grade cannot be assessed
